title: Anti-Democratic Super Weapon
description: It’s Supreme Court reform summer! On this episode, Leah talks to Professor Nikolas Bowie about his testimony to the Presidential commission on the Supreme Court and whether we have or should have a democracy.
author: hey@crooked.com (Crooked Media)
